bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, November 14, 1952

div1.p: Nogueira informs Hench that all invitations have gone out for the dedication of Camp Lazear. The official program will be sent out at a later date. He explains Hench's role during the dedication event and his attendance at a meeting of the Cuban Academy of Science. He assures Hench that the renovation of Building No. 1 is going well.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, November 14, 1952
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO
Marianao November 14 of 1952
TELEFONO: B0-7577
Dr Philip Hench.
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnessota
U.S.A.
Dear Philip:
div1.p:
According your letters I inform you, all persons named ir
it have been invited by letter, although later will mail them the
official program of said day.

The photos I asked for, are periodistical propaganda said day, so th
that if I get some, maybe I can publish on the papaers 3rd December.
I think you will be surprised when you see the photo of the Caseta;
but we have tried to do all possible to leave it as on 1900, although
we have used in some parts used woods and new in others; but we have
put enough it have and the rest not used will be left as souvenirs.

I think I have quite enough for that, I hope when you arrive here
I guess on the 2nd December I will show you the little house and all
well. I am sending some photos of all the work into few days.

As I told you before, you can take 8 or 10 minutes, that is on
said time, you will be able to explain, what you think opportune.

Talking about your true sentiment like American Physicians, pre-
sent among your partners recognized esteeming what this act constitu-
tes after 52 years.

The Park still is Lazear Camp, and the Building Number 1, keep on
with the name (same name), well up to now has been the Patronate
thinking; in one word the Park will be Lazear Camp and the Building
Number 1 or Fomites Building.-

My invitation is exactrly for the night Dcember 3rd al 9.00 P.M. on
the Science Academy, so that you ought to reserve your trip back 4th
day December.- You remember that night also the Condecoration Finlay
will be given this year.

DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO

You must bring with you a dinner jacket, why even the act is inform
mal all who sit down on the Presidential, and you will be one of
them, you need to attend with the formal dress.- Beside that night
the condecorated will place their jewels during the act.

Philip all is going alright up to now; the invitations on a mail
the next week, so that all could receive it on time (the persons
we esteem already we have invited by air mail).-

I am waiting Hanberry reply, to see how we can bring him down here.
My idea is well appreciated for him to be the one who unveil the
busts and the named plates.

I dont forget the persons, from Cuba, you mencioned to invited
them to the act, and as regard Miss Rojas and Miss Cabrera, I will
give them personally just the same Agramonte's daughter.

I agree with the last paragraph relating to the future, well you
know how much work; this matter has given me; but we are here to
continue on all necessary.

I am mailing today air way the others Negatives of the camp left,
so that anything needed when you come, you will tell me, what else
I can be useful.-

Philip you dont forget to say what plane and what flight you are
coming. to wait you at the airport I811 bring you over to National
Hotel in my car.

Write you next week early giving you some more notices, while a
sincerely greeting to Mary.
